subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: By injecting Mark Teixeira into a lineup that includes Chipper Jones, Andruw Jones and Jeff Francoeur, the Braves will become a much more imposing threat to the Mets in the N.L. East.
snippet: By injecting Mark Teixeira into a lineup that includes Chipper Jones, Andruw Jones and Jeff Francoeur, the Braves will become a much more imposing threat to the Mets in the N.L. East.
